chat.user_unknown: User isn't connected or doesn't exist
chat.help:
/mp <username> <msg>
- Send a private message to another connected user.
/(un)block <username>
- Block or unblock a user to no see theyr message.
/invite <username>
- Invite specified user to a pong game.

chat.authenticated: you are already authenticated with the chat
